Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27404 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.15.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-27404 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.15.9-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.15.9-1, affected by CVE-2022-27404
